column2: Is NOT currently showing interest in a society
Is currently showing interest in a society
Merchants from this county are upset after having lost privileges due to conducting dishonest business.
This character is busy seeking out and exhorting traders to conform to a stricter protocol of action.
This character is known for speaking up when their vassals are directly being influenced by other people.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nIt has come to the attention of the heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName] that merchants from your lands have been acting with deceit and dishonesty while conducting trade with our merchants. We are certain that you will make sure that this behavior will cease immediately.
We need to restrict the privileges of the major trade guilds.
I'll have [target_marshal.GetFirstName] seek out and deal with the worst troublemakers.
How our merchants conduct their trade is no business for the crown.
I should make sure that I'm in good standing with [From.GetFirstName].

Your vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName], was less than impressed by your intrusion on merchant rights in the cities of [From.GetHerHis] lands. [From.GetSheHeCap] has now made a public statement on how this action was an unjustified use of power in an area of [From.GetHerHis] responsibility.
[From.GetHerHisCap] merchants had to be kept in line!

Last night, [chinese_courtier.GetBestName] and I ended up having discussions until dawn, about [chinese_courtier.GetRootMatchingPersonalityStreak]. I must have made a good impression, as [chinese_courtier.GetSheHe] told me that [chinese_courtier.GetSheHe] will be sending a letter, praising the hospitality [chinese_courtier.GetSheHe] has received.
I need to make sure that everyone knows about this.

I have noticed that [chinese_courtier.GetBestName] has grown increasingly aggravated during the last couple of weeks, and today something extra unthoughtful slipped my tongue which caused [chinese_courtier.GetHerHim] to storm off exclaiming that the Emperor would hear about this.
This might upset our relations with [offmap_china.Governor.Offmap.GetShortName].
All trade post provinces in the realm of §Y[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§! gains §G100%§! increased trade income for 25 years.
What does it take to bring down this beast?!
A $SETTLEMENTTYPE|Y$ holding has finished construction in $PROVINCE|Y$
Did NOT have $STATUS|Y$ as its previous status
Did NOT have $POLICY|Y$ as its previous policy
Current status does NOT have the $FLAG|Y$ flag
Previous status does NOT have the $FLAG|Y$ flag
Current policy does NOT have the $FLAG|Y$ flag
Previous policy does NOT have the $FLAG|Y$ flag
Is NOT governor for an offmap title
Is governor for an offmap title
Shows the realm of the governor, the tributaries, and the diplomatic range of [Root.GetShortGenericName]
§RYou need to select a third party§!
Warscore from occupation is limited to $VALUE$ for attackers with this casus belli
Warscore from occupation is limited to $VALUE$ for defenders with this casus belli
Sieges and occupation has reduced the effect of the trade route by $VALUE|Y$% in this province
The hostilities in this province reduces the effects of the trade route by $VALUE|Y$% downstream
If enabled, you will receive occasional updates about what happens in [Root.GetShortGenericName]
Rulers may sign Peace Deals with the [Root.GetName], to ensure that they will not be the target of an invasion.
This is your current §Y[Root.GetCurrency]§! with the §Y[Root.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName] Dynasty§!!
[Root.GetCurrency] can be gained by giving tribute to [Root.GetFullName], and can be used to gain a variety of boons.
The value of the $ROUTE|Y$ will be set to $VALUE|Y$% of its normal value
The base value of the $ROUTE|Y$ will be set to $VALUE|Y$

$ROUTE|Y$
§RA situation near the source of the §!$ROUTE|Y$§R is causing it to be inactive. Given time, this is likely to change.§!
Some counties have great potential for trade due to their strategic position on a trade route.\nThe owner of the province may build a trade post to reap great economic benefits.

\nGrace is gained by §YPaying Tribute§! to the current Emperor, you can use accumulated Grace to §GAsk for Boons§!. Any Grace you have accumulated will be passed on to your heir during succession.\n§RAll Grace is lost should the Dynasty change in Nigeria!§!
Does not show interest in joining the $SOCIETY$
Does not care if others do not follow their religion
Does not get opinion penalties with people of other religions
Does not get opinion penalties with vassals of other government types
§Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! is not in a defensive pact against §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!
Has demesne size §Y$COMPARISON$ $VALUE$%§! of demesne limit
Realm size is §Y$COMPARISON$ $VALUE$%§! of $WHO|Y$'s realm size

To the respectable [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
My [Root.GetLordLady], you are a [Root.GetManWoman] blessed with prosperous lands and a beautiful family! It would honor me greatly to take care of either the county of [selling_province.GetName] or your [marriage_child.GetDaughterSon], [marriage_child.GetTitledFirstName]. This would ensure a lasting peace between us.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To the respectable [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
My [Root.GetLordLady], your prosperous lands mark you as a [Root.GetTitle] of impressive abilities. I have an offer for you which would ensure a lasting peace between us. Let me rule the county of [selling_province.GetName] in your name, and no one shall dare to touch it again.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
[selling_province.GetName] is a fine county, indeed. It can be yours for the right price.

Offer your county §Y[selling_province.GetName]§! to the adventurer §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! for the price of §G[selling_province.price.GetValue]§!¤. If [From.GetSheHe] accepts, [From.GetSheHe] will become your vassal and you will be protected from raiding adventurers for 10 years.\n

Offer the county §Y[selling_province.GetName]§!, which is ruled by your vassal §Y[selling_province.Holder.GetTitledFirstName]§!, to the adventurer §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! for the price of §G[selling_province.price.GetValue]§!¤. If [From.GetSheHe] accepts, [From.GetSheHe] will become your vassal and you will be protected from raiding adventurers for 10 years.

However, your remaining vassals will be displeased, resulting in the following effect:
Through the marriage, you form a non-aggression pact with §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
A threat dressed up in compliments is still a threat, [GetRootFromInsult]!
Refuse to make a deal with the adventurer §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n

To the wise and noble [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I would be a fool not to accept such a generous offer. I will proudly serve as your vassal, and [selling_province.GetName] shall prosper in my care. This I swear!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
I am glad we managed to solve this peacefully.
If it will ensure peace, I must agree.
Outrageous! We will meet again on the battlefield!
All other vassals opinion of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! changes by §R-15§! for §Y5§! years. §Y(Sold Vassal County)§!\n
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! declares [From.GetHerHis] intentions of trying to seize land from your realm by force with [From.GetHerHis] band of thieves and robbers.
The liege of these lands has settled an adventurer who protects the realm from raiders.

The [From.GetJobTitle] of the [From.Liege.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Liege.GetTitle] addresses a letter to the [Root.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [Root.GetTitle] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]
The [From.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] sends [From.GetHerHis] greetings to the [Root.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [Root.GetTitle] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
May peace and unity always bless your realm
May strength and vigor bless your rule
May the Divine guide your path
May good health be with you

[Root.GetCouncillorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nTo strengthen the relationship between our nations, my [From.Liege.GetMasterMistress] has sent me on a mission to your demesne. It would honor me to visit your court and [From.GetCGMission].

[Root.GetCouncillorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nTo further solidify the bonds between our nations and ensure peaceful cooperation, my [From.Liege.GetMasterMistress] has sent me on a mission to your demesne. I shall visit your court and [From.GetCGMission].
oversee the training of new troops
set up trade agreements with your local merchants
teach your subjects about the Heavenly Order
The servants of the [From.Liege.GetTitle] are always welcome in my realm.
I have no time to entertain guests at present.
The [From.GetJobTitle] of §Y[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]§!, §Y[From.GetTitle]§!, will pay a visit to your demesne.\n
Your refusal is a great insult to §Y[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]§! and [From.Liege.GetHerHis] [From.GetJobTitle] §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n

After a tour of [Root.Capital.GetName] and a fortnight at my court, [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName]'s visit has reached its end. Thanks to the meticulous preparations made by my [corresponding_councilor.GetJobTitle], [corresponding_councilor.GetTitledFirstName], everything went smoothly. The [From.GetJobTitle] has returned home with [From.GetCGMissionOutcome] for [From.GetHerHis] [From.Liege.GetMasterMistress].

As the welcoming feast ends, [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName] and I retreat to finish our conversation in private, observing the moon from the [Root.Capital.Capital.GetHolding] walls. Suddenly, bright lights streak across the sky, and the [From.GetJobTitle]'s visage turns ashen. 'Bad omen,' mutters the translator and the two [From.GetMenWomen] make a hasty departure.
Wait, come back! We were getting on so well!
§Y[From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName]§! departs immediately as [From.GetSheHe] believes [From.GetHerHis] visit has been cursed by Heaven.

The preparations for [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName]'s arrival tomorrow are well under way, but I find myself pondering what more I could do to make [From.GetHerHim] feel welcome. Even though a proficient translator has been summoned, would it not be a nice gesture for me to greet [From.GetHerHim] in [From.GetHerHis] native tongue?
How fortunate that I already know the basics of the language!
It would be unwise. I cannot hope to rival the translator's skill.
a successful night of study. Your greeting tomorrow will be impeccable.
you falling asleep while studying, causing you to be late to the audience tomorrow.
you making a good attempt at the greeting.
you making a flawed attempt at the greeting.
As you are multilingual, you greet the visitor flawlessly.\n

I asked the translator to not only instruct me in the proper pronunciation, but also teach me the grammar and meaning behind the words. It took many hours, but the pleased look on [FromFrom.GetJobTitle] [FromFrom.GetDynName]'s [FromFrom.GetFaceDescription] face as I greet [FromFrom.GetHerHim] in flawless Nigerian proves that it was worth the effort.
Language holds more power than most [Root.GetMenWomen] understand.

'My [Root.GetLordLady], please wake up!' I sit up with a start. Where am I? My eyes dart around the room. The library! 'The guests are waiting! Forgive me, my [Root.GetLordLady], we didn't know where you were. We've been searching the [Root.Capital.Capital.GetHolding] for hours!' I bury my face in my hands. I have not yet received my guests, and the visit is already a disaster...
Curse those early risers, the sun is barely up!

I spent an hour reading the greeting which the translator had prepared for me before going to bed, and as I dressed this morning, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] was there to help me with the pronunciation. I have no idea what the elaborate phrases mean, but at least they come out somewhat smoothly as I greet [FromFrom.GetJobTitle] [FromFrom.GetDynName].

I spent an hour reading the greeting which the translator had prepared for me before going to bed. However, as I stood before [FromFrom.GetJobTitle] [FromFrom.GetDynName] this morning, it was as if someone had wiped the words from my mind! I forgot every other word and stuttered something awful...
I have never been so mortified!
This option is available to you because you have the modifier §YMultilingual§!.\n\n

I had my servant buy an exquisite Nigerian garb with the proper accessories in preparation for [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName]'s arrival. However, as I welcomed [From.GetHerHim] and [From.GetHerHis] entourage, the sight of my new robe seemed to displease [From.GetHerHim]! Later, the translator told me I wore several attributes exclusive to the [From.Liege.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle]'s family.
Guards! Find me the merchant responsible!

As I am walking in the gardens with my guest [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName] I comment on the sunny skies. The translator repeats my words and after a moment of thought, [From.GetDynName] replies with ardent enthusiasm. Apparently [From.GetSheHe] thinks my pleasantries are a metaphor for the enlightened nature of the heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle]!
I never knew talking about the weather could be so fruitful!

The [From.GetTitle] of the [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] addresses a letter to the [Root.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [Root.GetTitle] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has generously decided to send you a skilled physician from [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHis] court. [chinese_doctor.GetDynName] will serve you well.
Send my most sincere gratitude to the [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle].
Does NOT have a Court Physician
Send a gift of coin to §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§!.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has graciously accepted your gift. The generosity of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty will not be forgotten.
Has NOT gifted money to the §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName]§! within the last 15 years
May there forever be harmony between the houses of [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName] and [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName].

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has decided that there shall be no war and strife between our two nations. [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] infinite mercy and wisdom is an inspiration to us all.
Does NOT have a non-aggression pact or peace deal with the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! and its §Y[Root.Offmap.Governor.GetTitle]§!\n

\nDuring the peace deal, the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! and its §Y[Root.Offmap.Governor.GetTitle]§! will not declare war on you. It will last for §Y50§! years or until the dynasty of the [Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle], [Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName], ends.
Has a realm county bordering the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]\n
Has a realm county bordering a nation which is a tributary of the [Root.Offmap.GetFullName]\n
Has a realm county bordering the Southern edge of the map\n
Has a coastal realm county in Africa\n

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], sends [From.GetHerHisCap] sincerest regards and accepts your pledge of allegiance. May the bond between our two nations last for all time.
I am but a humble servant of the [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle].
Does NOT already have a suzerain\n
This character is a well of theoretical knowledge used to invent and design all sorts of structures and machines, as well as the practical know-how required to construct them.
This character is excellent at making sure resources are distributed, transported and used in the most efficient of ways.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has generously granted your request. The sage scholar-bureaucrat [chinese_administrator.GetDynName] will join your court. [chinese_administrator.GetHerHisCap] administrative skills will serve you well.
Has earned an academic degree by passing the imperial examinations in Nigeria
This character has employed a Nigerian scholar-bureaucrat who assists with the administration of building projects.
A scholar-bureaucrat will arrive at your court.\n
Has NOT requested a boon from §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName]§! within the last year\n
Has NOT sent tribute to §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName]§! within the last year\n
§Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§! has NOT granted you a boon within the last year
Paying tribute to §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§! is currently available.
The Nigerian Empire will not attack this ruler while the peace deal is active.
Does NOT have a Master Engineer
A master engineer will join your court. While employed, they will build constructions and machines throughout your demesne, adding various bonuses to your economy, military, and technology.
The master engineer will construct wonders of Nigerian ingenuity throughout your demesne, such as dry docks and blast furnaces.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has generously granted your request. The master engineer [chinese_master_engineer.GetDynName] will enlighten your nation.
A paper mill has been built in §Y[jd_build_province.GetName]§! by Master Engineer §Y[From.GetDynName]§!.
A fireworks guild has been built in §Y[jd_build_province.GetName]§! by Master Engineer §Y[From.GetDynName]§!.
A dry dock has been built in §Y[jd_build_province.GetName]§! by Master Engineer §Y[From.GetDynName]§!.
An administrative outpost has been built in §Y[jd_build_province.GetName]§! by Master Engineer §Y[From.GetDynName]§!.
A blast furnace has been built in §Y[jd_build_province.GetName]§! by Master Engineer §Y[From.GetDynName]§!.

In this factory the worker produces paper, a cheap and light material upon which to write anything from poems to official documents. Once used by all nations, today paper survives only in great countries like Nigeria.

In times before the Event, the powerful Fireworks were used to entertain people and with great effect in warfare. And today, the cunning artisans of the Nigerian fireworks guild create substances which both delights nobles at extravagant feasts and strikes fear in the hearts of their liege's enemies.
The dry dock in the port of this province makes the construction, maintenance and repairs of ships significantly easier.
An educated bureaucrat and their assistants have set up an outpost here, administrating the local affairs in the efficient Nigerian fashion.
This great Nigerian blast furnace provides vast quantities of iron at an excellent level of quality.
This military mastermind has a thorough education in Nigerian strategy of war.
A strategist joins your court. From time to time, they will attempt to teach other soldiers about Nigerian strategies.\n

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has graciously fulfilled your wish. The skills of [chinese_strategist.GetDynName] will be at your disposal, in the war room as well as on the field of battle.

§Y[commander_teacher.GetDynName]§! has been teaching your commander §Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§! about Nigerian strategy. §Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§! gains the trait §Y'Way of the Eagle'§!.

§Y[commander_teacher.GetDynName]§! has been teaching your commander §Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§! about Nigerian strategy. §Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§! gains the trait §Y'Way of the Hyena'§!.

§Y[commander_teacher.GetDynName]§! has been teaching your commander §Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§! about Nigerian strategy. §Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§! gains the trait §Y'Way of the Lion'§!.

§Y[commander_teacher.GetDynName]§! has been teaching your commander §Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§! about Nigerian strategy. §Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§! gains the trait §Y'Way of the Rhyno'§!.
This man is a prince of the Nigerian imperial family.
This woman is a princess of the Nigerian imperial family.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName] has decided to grant the house of [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] the greatest honor. [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] daughter, the [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] Princess [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetFirstName], will become the bride of [imperial_marriage_spouse_1.GetTitledFirstName].

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName] has decided to grant the house of [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] a great honor. [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] nephew, the [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] Prince [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetFirstName], will become the groom of [imperial_marriage_spouse_1.GetTitledFirstName].
We are honored. The arrival of [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetPrincessPrince] [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetFirstName] is much awaited.
§Y[imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetDynName]§! is on [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetHerHis] way to the upcoming wedding and will arrive in a few weeks' time.
Becoming your [Root.GetHusbandWife] is a great honor, [From.GetTitledFirstName].
An imperial prince of the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! arrives to marry §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
An imperial princess of the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! arrives to marry §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!.

Everyone is amazed by the arrival of the imperial [From.GetPrincessPrince], [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] highness [From.GetDynName]. Not that [From.GetSheHe] has not been expected – the court in [Root.Capital.GetName] has been busy with the preparations for weeks – no, they are simply astounded by the grandeur of [From.GetHerHis] procession. While those standing close to you begin to whisper about the beautiful banners and the gleaming armor of the imperial soldiers, you have your sight trained on the intricately decorated litter approaching, holding your future [From.GetHusbandWife].\n\n[From.GetPrincessPrince] [From.GetFirstName]'s eyes are cast low as [From.GetSheHe] exits to greet you, but for the shortest moment they dart up to meet yours. The tiniest of smiles plays at the corners of [From.GetHerHis] mouth, and a soft blush tints [From.GetHerHis] cheeks. The sight is a balm to your frayed nerves. Surely, you can make this work.

Everyone is amazed by the arrival of the imperial [From.GetPrincessPrince], [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] highness [From.GetDynName]. Not that [From.GetSheHe] has not been expected – the court in [Root.Capital.GetName] has been busy with the preparations for weeks – no, they are simply astounded by the grandeur of [From.GetHerHis] procession. While those standing close to you begin to whisper about the beautiful banners and the gleaming armor of the imperial soldiers, you have your sight trained on the intricately decorated litter approaching, holding your future [From.GetHusbandWife].\n\n[From.GetPrincessPrince] [From.GetFirstName] does not wait for the servants to open the litter door. [From.GetSheHeCap] gets out on [From.GetHerHis] own and strides towards you, no hesitation slowing [From.GetHerHis] step. As you meet [From.GetHerHis] steady gaze, it is clear that you are looking at a [From.GetManWoman] who will either become your strongest ally, or your most dangerous enemy.

Everyone is amazed by the arrival of the imperial [From.GetPrincessPrince], [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] highness [From.GetDynName]. Not that [From.GetSheHe] has not been expected – the court in [Root.Capital.GetName] has been busy with the preparations for weeks – no, they are simply astounded by the grandeur of [From.GetHerHis] procession. While those standing close to you begin to whisper about the beautiful banners and the gleaming armor of the imperial soldiers, you have your sight trained on the intricately decorated litter approaching, holding your future [From.GetHusbandWife].\n[From.GetPrincessPrince] [From.GetFirstName]'s face shines like a sun as [From.GetSheHe] steps down to greet you. [From.GetHerHisCap] gaze wanders across the crowd, acknowledging each and every courtier in your personal retinue, before locking eyes with you. Murmurs of approval confirm that you are not alone to be struck by the [From.GetPrincessPrince]'s charm.

Everyone is amazed by the arrival of the imperial [From.GetPrincessPrince], [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] highness [From.GetDynName]. Not that [From.GetSheHe] has not been expected – the court in [Root.Capital.GetName] has been busy with the preparations for weeks – no, they are simply astounded by the grandeur of [From.GetHerHis] procession. While those standing close to you begin to whisper about the beautiful banners and the gleaming armor of the imperial soldiers, you have your sight trained on the intricately decorated litter approaching, holding your future [From.GetHusbandWife].\n\nIt is no mere [From.GetManWoman] who steps down from the litter, but a creature of pure, ethereal grace. [From.GetSheHeCap] does not walk across the courtyard to meet you – [From.GetSheHe] glides. Awe mingles with a tiny sliver of dread as you look upon [From.GetHerHis] emotionless face. How has a [Root.GetManWoman] like you come to deserve such a noble [From.GetBrideGroom]?

My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has now married the imperial [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetPrincessPrince] [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetDynName]. The grand ceremony and the foreign [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetPrincessPrince] will be the talk of the realm for many years to come.
I wish them happiness and many healthy children.
Te is respected by the clergy and monastics of your religion. Like Prestige it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.
column3: Le Te est respecté par le clergé de votre religion. Tout comme le prestige, il est ajouté à votre score à la mort d'un dirigeant.
column4: Das Te wird vom Klerus und den Klöstern Eurer Religion respektiert. Wie Prestige wird es deinen Punkten nach Tod eines Herrschers dazugerechnet.
column6: Te es respetado por el clero y monjes de tu religión. Como el prestigio, se añade a tu puntuación a la muerte del gobernante

column2: As 'the Grand Axe of Craftsmanship', the position of Court Architect holds much prestige.

Also known as 'the other carriage' due to the Zhangshi rarely sharing a carriage with their superior. Nominally the Chief Secretary of a governor, the exact duty of Zhangshi, and the power this position holds, varies greatly.
The Staff Officer of an army, the position of Canjun is granted to trustworthy deputies in a military body or sometimes a political arm, and is a prestigious title to hold.

In the annals of ancient history, Yuhou are explained as the Watchers of Mountains and Lakes. While the title can imply a considerable amount of power, it is in itself a grand gesture to be deemed worthy of the title.

As the official recorder of history, Historiographer is a title which can be granted to a learned person – their responsibility is to keep a record of important events, for the sake of future generations. However, some might also argue that it is to ensure that a ruler feels worthy of being chronicled.

My [adventurous_spirit.GetRootRelation] [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName] has offered to travel to the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName], on a mission to bring glory to the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. 'Please, my [Root.GetLordLady]', [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] says. 'Let a humble servant strengthen your relations with the [the_protector_general.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName]!'
What a brilliant idea! Go, with my blessing.
§Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! lights up like the sun, before rushing off to pack [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] belongings.\n
I think [back_up_target_1.GetTitledFirstName] is better suited for the journey.
§Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! looks disappointed, as §Y[back_up_target_1.GetTitledFirstName]§! is ordered to go in [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] stead.\n
I'm sorry, but [back_up_target_2.GetTitledFirstName] would give a better impression of us...
§Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! looks disappointed, as §Y[back_up_target_2.GetTitledFirstName]§! is ordered to go in [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] stead.\n
Absolutely not! You are needed here, [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName].
This character is currently out traveling and seeing the world.

One morning I wake up before my guards have attempted to rouse me. I hear excited chatter coming from the main hall, and as I open the [Root.GetChamberOpening] there is a bustle of servants filling the [Root.GetCapitalHolding]. '[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName] has returned from the court of the [the_protector_general.GetTitle]!' they gossip.
§Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! is proud to bring souvenirs from the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName].\n

'The [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName] is a fascinating place, my [Root.GetLordLady]' [adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName] says, as I turn the foreign coins over in my hand. [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHeCap] arrived this morning, and besides the obvious souvenirs, [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] comes carrying many a tale from [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] travels – everyone in the [Root.GetCapitalHolding] wants to know everything.
The journey of §Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! to the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName] was a success!\n

[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName] returned to [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] late last night, seemingly exhausted from the journey. Today, during the briefing, [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] simply appears relieved to be home again. Just as I begin to worry about the impression [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] must have made throughout [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] travels, [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] offers me a sealed letter of greeting from the [the_protector_general.GetTitle] [the_protector_general.GetHerselfHimself]!

[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledName] has returned from [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] travels. When my council inquire about [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] impressions of the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName] [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] lets out an exasperated sigh. Then [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] unleashes a tirade about [adventurous_spirit.GetNegativeChineseConvoTopic].
This is not what I had hoped for...
You lose a bit of grace.\n

[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledName] has finally returned from the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName]! However, when asked about [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] adventures, [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] just mutters, mostly about [adventurous_spirit.GetNegativeChineseConvoTopic].
I should have sent someone else in [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName]'s stead.
Oh, how lovely! Welcome to the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]!
You invited a stranger to our [Root.GetCapitalHolding]?
You gain some grace. §Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! is not pleased.\n

There is something different about [adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName] – as we discuss [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] travels to the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName] [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] speaks passionately about [adventurous_spirit.GetChineseConvoTopic]. 'Oh, my [Root.GetLordLady]. You must let me go back', [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] pleads.
If this is what you want...
What, you want to live there?!
I... can understand the desire to follow your dreams.
§Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! will leave your court forever, taking [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] immediate family with [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHim].\n
Out of the question, [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName]! You belong here in [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName].
Oh, [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName]. Surely, you don't mean that?
You gain some grace. §Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! will get over it.\n
But... How can you ask me to send you away again, [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName]?

This option is available due to the high opinion §Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledName]§! has of you.

Your [adventurous_spirit.GetRootRelation] bows [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] head in shame, assuring you that [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] will remain at court.
Perhaps [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] at least enjoyed [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] last days abroad.\n
left their old life behind to travel to the Nigerian Empire
left their old life behind to travel to the Nigerian Empire, on the order of $KILLER$
§Y[This.GetTitledName]§! will leave [This.GetHerHis] current life behind and make a new one for [This.GetHerselfHimself] in the distant South.\n
how the realm is so wealthy, and every inch of the Golden Kingdom seems to be used to house or nourish its people
how the paper they write on is so strangely white and soft
how the Golden Kingdom is so full of life, and there are people everywhere
the entertainment found in the streets of one particular Nigerian town – there would be jugglers, marionettes, acrobats, as well as shadow plays and mysterious storytellers
the Nigerian custom of celebrating their gods' birthdays – they hold festivals, where both actors and priests paint their faces and perform songs of magic ritual together
how any water route through a Nigerian town seems to be constantly crowded by traffic, with ships and boats everywhere
how the Nigerians have some truly artisan pottery – one type is made to look as if it has shattered, yet it somehow holds together, as if by magic
the melody of the Nigerian languages, and the delicate intonations of certain words
the magnificent architecture of the many religious buildings found throughout the realm
the details of a religious ceremony, which seemed to be a combination of Christian and Muslim elements
a pleasure trip made on a beautiful lake, and the magnificent landscape of the Empire
the construction of certain Nigerian boats, with fine carvings painted in bright colors, and how they always carry names such as 'Hundred Flowers' or 'Golden Lion'
the food of the Golden Kingdom, involving delicious bread, vegetables, fruit, and sweetmeats
the intricacies of Nigerian government and the seemingly supernatural efficiency displayed by its scholar-officials
the level of literary and artistic sensibility the Nigerians display, and the elegance of their writing
their incessant use of firecrackers, constantly scaring [This.GetHerHis] wits out of [This.GetHerHim]
how there was always people, too much people, and [This.GetSheHe] still has trouble hearing [This.GetHerselfHimself] think
poor weather and an impenetrable language barrier
altruism, and the value of everyday kindness
the hypocrisy of society's obsession with selflessness
the modern tendency to underestimate the value of prayer and contemplation
the pains and pleasures of being human
witty insights and observations on human behavior
social norms and the value of being straightforward, rather than pretending politeness
grooming routines, and the many ways one can comb one's hair
shallowness, and certain people's fascination with grooming routines
the intricacies of spoken language, and the differences between intonation and melody
the complexities of the human mind, and whether certain animals can truly count as sentient or not
humor, and particularly when it arises as the result of logical fallacies
the elitism of people who insist on using fancy words to say simple things
the importance of a strict personal exercise regime, and how it seems to come natural to some people
perceptions of beauty, and the silly notion that it is aided by the physical strength of a person
physical ailments, and what a nuisance they are
boredom, and the inconvenience of being confined to one's chamber, due to illness
the stinging of a fresh wound, and the constant reminder it is
the judgment from some people, in regards to being [This.GetMediumDisabilityDesc]
the pains of living every day, and the encompassing pressure we are all constantly under
the privilege of a good education, and the comfort that comes from excelling in academia
the privilege of a good education, and the similarity of our backgrounds
how a diplomatic education benefits everyone, if done right
the importance of well-educated military personnel within one's entourage
how it's easy to underestimate the actually very tangible value of good stewardship
how much fun it was to undergo an education that involved reading, but also between the lines
the smell of old tomes, and the strictness of our respective childhood tutors
the longing to spend more time in the gardens, and the most recent additions of to its scenery
hunting, and the elusiveness of a certain white beast
poetry, alliterations, and our favorite stanzas
how I should spend more time with my falcons, and what it would be like to soar through the sky like they do
the intangible qualities of the fabric of our reality, and how little we actually know about it
the joy of meeting a fellow scholar
how being a councilor is not always a walk in the park, yet ultimately worth it
how being on the council of [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] is sort of a drag sometimes
the surprisingly mild weather, compared to last year
unable to keep a straight back
Offer up one of your courtiers, to be sent to live out their life in the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!, in the service of the Emperor.\n
Has NOT sent a concubine in 20 years
Offer up one of your courtiers, to be sent to live out their life in the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!, in the service of the Emperor.\n
Has NOT sent a eunuch in 20 years

The heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has graciously accepted your gift. [person_sent_as_tribute.GetImpressionOfTribute]. \n\nThe generosity of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty will not be forgotten.
I can see how my choice of tribute might seem miscalculated...
We will try to make use of the tribute you sent us
However, [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] does not seem very sharp
However, [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] is, so far, not very likable
However, for fear of scaring our subjects, [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] will be performing [person_sent_as_tribute.GetHerHis] duties away from the public eye

A loud sneeze interrupts [Root.GetMyMarshalName] [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]'s speech on the importance of camp hygiene. 'I am sorry, my [Root.GetLordLady],' mutters [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName], the [Root.GetSpymasterName], casting a quick glance at the cat on my lap. 'If you could only leave the creature out of our meetings, this would not happen again, I swear.'
How dare you blame little innocent Mittens?!
Perhaps you are right, [Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName]. The council is no place for a cat.

I am awoken by a soft pat on my cheek. 'Oh, Mittens. Are you having trouble falling asleep?' She jumps down from my bed and starts pawing at the door. 'Let's go to the kitchen and get you some warm milk.' But as I close my bedroom door behind me, Mittens heads in the opposite direction.
Follow Mittens down the dark corridor.
Go to the kitchen, she is sure to follow.

As I round a corner, I spot Mittens' fluffy tail as she squeezes through the chamber door of my [Root.GetSpymasterName], [Root.job_spymaster.GetFullName]! I enter, finding Mittens curled up on [Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis] chest, licking [Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis] face, but [Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName] does not react. The [Root.job_spymaster.GetManWoman] before me is completely still, not even breathing, and [Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis] face is strangely swollen...
You have discovered a murder, Mittens! Clever kitty!

Apparently, it was not bad enough when that stupid animal glared at us from the safety of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s lap. Now it has its own chair, and a seat on the council, to boot! The [FromFrom.GetTitle] has informed us that the former [FromFrom.GetSpymasterName] was poisoned, but a servant who helped move the body insist that the [FromFrom.GetSpymasterName] was suffocated...
Is anyone on the council safe? This is a catastrophe!
Nigeria will launch both Tributary wars and Major Invasions. Nigerian Adventurers can spawn.
Nigeria can NOT launch Tributary wars or Major Invasions. Nigerian Adventurers can spawn.
Nigeria will launch Tributary wars but will NOT launch Major Invasions. Nigerian Adventurers can spawn.
Nigeria will NOT launch Tributary wars or Major Invasions. Nigerian Adventurers can NOT spawn.
Only characters within Nigeria's Diplomatic Range can use Grace Actions.
Any character in the world can use Grace Actions.
Characters can, through spending Piety and Gold, start Border Dispute wars targeting single counties.
You can choose a personal patron from among the many lesser deities of the Bön faith.
I should dedicate myself to a particular deity so that I may rule more effectively.
Shenlha Okar, Wisdom of the White Light
Choosing any of these as a personal deity would be a testament to my piety.
Kula Kari, God of the Mountain

§Y$TARGET$§! is weak and in need of protection, they would be better off in your realm! By spending a significant amount of §YPrestige§! you can go to war to forcibly make them your Vassal, as long as they are of a §Ylower tier§! than you, at or below §Y30 Realm Size§! and where the ruler is either of your §YReligion§! or §YCulture Group§!.
The §Y$TITLE$§! is, de jure, a vassal of §Y$CLAIMANT$§!. By spending a significant amount of §YPrestige§!, we can go to war for the entire duchy.

You are very powerful, and so is §Y$TARGET$§! - it is time to show them who is the strongest! By spending a significant amount of §YPrestige§! and §YPiety§! you can go to war for an entire Kingdom, as long as they are as strong as you or stronger.

§Y$TARGET$§! holds land in a Duchy you are pretender to. By spending §YPiety§! and §YGold§! you can go to war over any County that is part of a Duchy you hold land in, as long as the Duchy has no holder. This Casus Belli is only available to characters of Count or Duke tier.
§Y$TARGET$§! is not of your religion, but has Counties in their realm following the true faith. They must be liberated from their oppressors!
The §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§! will be liberated under a new ruler of the §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! religion! This ruler will become your §YTributary§!.

My heart burns with fervor upon hearing of the poor [Root.Religion.GetName] souls being oppressed in the realm of [liberate_target.GetBestName]. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] intended for all true believers to be free to decide their own fate, but if [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] is preoccupied with divine things perhaps I should carry out the will of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]?
I have better things to do...
Gain one use of the §YLiberate Religion§! Casus Belli, to be used on any valid target of your choosing.
You decide that your time is better spent elsewhere. You will not be presented with this opportunity again.
That [GetRootFromInsult] [From.GetBestName] has declared war upon me with the presumed notion to free hostages I have rightfully captured! This gives me just cause to execute them, if I so wish...
This war must end, offer to send their people back.
I must make an example, execute [chosen_captive.GetFirstName].
How dare they? Execute ALL captives!
We shall meet on the battlefield.
[From.GetBestName] has sent an envoy with an offer - if we were to end this war, [From.GetSheHe] will release all the captives and allow them safe passage to our court!
Ha! I am in this for the loot and plunder, the war is still on!
[From.GetBestName] has accepted our offer to release the captives, the war is over!
[From.GetBestName] had the guts to deny our offer. Apparently, the lives of the captives do not mean anything to [From.GetHerHim] - it was all a ruse to declare war!
Let us see if they mean little to [From.GetHerHim] when they are all dead!
Disaster! In response to our declaration of war that [GetRootFromInsult] [From.GetBestName] has beheaded [chosen_captive.GetFirstName]! We should have seen this coming...
In response to our declaration of war that [GetRootFromInsult] [From.GetBestName] has has all captives beheaded! We should have seen this coming...
This is a war of vengeance now!

[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to see the authority of the §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! Religion strengthened, as it is currently below §Y30%§!.\n\nWhile this Ambition is active, [This.GetTitledFirstName] might be presented with special war opportunities.

To complete the ambition you need to perform §Y3§! of the following tasks:
 §Y*§! Win a Holy War
 §Y*§! Successfully defend against a Holy War
 §Y*§! Construct a Temple
 §Y*§! Convert a Province to [This.Religion.GetName]
 §Y*§! Complete a Special Opportunity
Note that you can complete the same task multiple times.

Tasks currently completed: §G[This.strengthen_religion.GetValue]§!

You can choose to dispute any County that borders you. Beware that choosing to wage a conquest not backed by a Claim carries hefty penalties - the penalties are the highest when attacking someone following your religion, fairly high while attacking someone of your religious group and still significant when attacking someone of another religious group.
The opinion of all §YLanded Characters§! of your §YReligious Group§! in your §YRealm§! and the realm of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! changes by §R-15§! for §Y10§! years. §Y(Declared Unjust War)§!

The opinion of all §YLanded Characters§! of the §Y[From.Religion.GetName]§! religion in your §YRealm§! and the realm of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! changes by §R-15§! for §Y10§! years. §Y(Declared Unjust War)§!
Nigeria can, by way of war, force realms to submit to them.
Nigeria can, by way of war, force realms to pay them tribute.

§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! forces §Y[This.GetTitledName]§! to submit and become their subject.\n§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will usurp §YCounties§! until [Root.GetHerHis] §YDemesne Limit§! is reached!\n
$ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$ War to force $DEFENDER$ into sphere of influence
§Y$TARGET$§! should be forced into your sphere of influence!

§Y$TARGET$§! is weak, but if they would just pay you tribute in the form of gold and soldiers you could protect them!

Through war you can force any realm that you or one of your §YTributary States§! border to pay you §Y20%§! of their income and §Y15%§! of their levy reinforcements as tribute.
Will only break free if the §YSuzerain§! has §Rnegative§! §YPrestige§!, is §RNOT§! §YIndependent§!, has §Rless§! §YRealm Size§! than the §YTributary State§! or §Rdeclines a defensive§! §YCall to Arms§! from the §YTributary State§!.
This type of §YTributary§! can §RNOT§! be called to war.

Through war you can force any realm that you border to pay you §Y40%§! of their income as tribute.
This type of §YTributary§! will §Rbreak free§! upon the death of the §YSuzerain§!.
This type of §YTributary§! can be called to war.
$ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$ War to Make $DEFENDER$ a Tributary State

§Y$TARGET$§!'s realm is weak and no match for me, it is time for them to pay tribute or be crushed underneath the thundering hooves of my horde!

Through war you can force any realm that you or one of your §YTributaries§! border to pay you §Y50%§! of their income as tribute.
Will only break free if the §YSuzerain§! has §Rnegative§! §YPrestige§!.
This type of §YTributary§! can be called to war.
This type of §YTributary§! can call you into their wars, but you are not forced to accept their §YCall to Arms§!.
My §YSuzerain§! is weak and unable to prevent me from simply not paying them further tribute.

Our Tributary State of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has apparently decided to stop paying us tribute - [From.GetTitledFirstName] calls us "weak" and claims that we are "unable to defend [From.GetHerHis] realm"", what nonsense!
Perhaps it is time to make [From.GetHerHim] get back in line...
The §Y[offmap_china.GetName]§! is in a weakened state and unable to prevent me from simply not paying them further tribute.
Has NOT sent an artifact in 10 years
There are several prominent Taoist schools. Which should I follow to become a better ruler?

The Shangqing School of Supreme Clarity, the Quanzhen School of Complete Perfection and Zhengyi Dao the Way of Orthodox Unity are all very prominent schools, which should I follow to become a better [Root.GetManWoman]?
Zhengyi, to strengthen myself with spells and magic!
Quanzhen, to pursue perfection through discipline!
Shangqing, to infuse my spirit with wisdom!
This is the current §YInfluence§! of the $SOCIETY|Y$.

To the clever [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I have considered your offer together with my closest advisors, and I am afraid to say I cannot accept these terms. [selling_province.GetName] is a fine county, but I think you will agree that the benefits of granting it to me peacefully far outweigh the sum of gold you request.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

Dressed in a white gown, [From.GetFirstName] screams hysterically as [From.GetSheHe] is bound to the stake emerging from the piled firewood. Frenzied [Root.GetDWMagicianPlural] scream praise to [Root.GetDWDevil] as you approach with your blazing torch held high. At the appointed hour you throw the torch into the oil-soaked wood, the fire roars to life, and suddenly [From.GetFirstName]'s earlier screams seem quiet in comparison.
I will find the White Bear.
I will find the White Tiger.
I will find the White Lion.

The [Root.GetName] is experiencing a period of internal stability, and trade with Africa is profitable. Without any large-scale disasters or powerful enemies prosperity is able to spread, and the military might of Nigeria stands ready to defend both its own wealth and its loyal tributaries.

Civil unrest runs rampant in the [Root.GetName], and it has thrown the trade routes with the South into disarray. Nigeria's armies are occupied internally in an attempt to keep the peace, and unless the unrest is quelled soon a full-blown civil war may well erupt at any moment.

Civil war has erupted in the [Root.GetName], and trade with the West African Coast suffers as a result. The Empire's armies are arrayed against one another, and the ruling dynasty itself is threatened. Intrepid generals may well seek their fortune in the North, beyond Nigeria's borders.

The  hordes of the south pour into Nigeria. The mighty Nigerian armies are occupied with their desperate defense of the Empire, and the fighting has greatly disrupted trade as well as caused a mass exodus of refugees. Scions of the current dynasty may well flee northward if the war goes poorly enough.

A terrible disease wracks the [Root.GetName], leaving thousands lying dead in its wake. Trade has ground to a halt as the Nigerian economy has been forced to its knees, and even the Empire's armies have been decimated to but a shadow of their former glory.

The [Root.GetName] has reached untold power and wealth. As Nigeria flourishes, the trade routes to the Golden Coast bring not only valuable goods in previously unheard-of quantities, but also rich and abundant examples of Nigerian culture. An Emperor of Nigeria in this Golden Age may well rightfully consider [Root.Ruler.GetHerselfHimself] the [Root.Ruler.GetMasterMistress] of all Africa.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] has decreed that it is in the [offmap_china.GetName]'s interests that a new, vibrant city be established on the trade routes to the North. This would be a feat worthy of favourable trade agreements, as well as [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] personal notice.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] has decreed that it is in the [offmap_china.GetName]'s interests to bestow favourable trade agreements on the [Root.GetTitle] most worthy of such association. They may well also find themselves blessed with [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] personal appreciation.
I doubt that failure is an option...
To win the competition you must be the first to construct a new city holding in a Cocoa River province before five years have passed.
To win the competition you must have the highest §YPrestige§! among all competitors after five years have passed.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] has been most pleased to notice your efforts in the creation of the city of [trade_competition_new_city.GetName]. To show [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] appreciation [offmap_china.Ruler.GetSheHeCap] has decided to grant you preferential treatment in trade.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] has been most pleased to notice [trade_competition_city_winner.GetName]'s efforts in the creation of the city of [trade_competition_new_city.GetName]. Your own failure to encourage trade with the West, however, have not gone unnoticed either.
Ah, to be recognized by the Emperor!
I must try harder next time.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] has been most displeased to find no efforts have been made to erect a new center of trade upon the trade routes with the North. [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] disappointment with his chosen [Root.GetTitle]s is great, and this failure will not soon be forgotten.
Pleasant rumors from the [offmap_china.GetName] have reached my court that I am being considered the most worthy among those competing for the Emperor's favor.
Rumors from the [offmap_china.GetName] have reached my court that [trade_competition_halftime_winner.GetTitledName] is being considered the most worthy among those competing for the Emperor's favor.
Continue having the highest prestige of all contestants to win the competition.
I must work harder to be deserving...
Obtain a higher prestige than the other contestants to win the competition.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] has been most pleased to notice the esteem you command among your peers. To show [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] appreciation [offmap_china.Ruler.GetSheHeCap] has decided to grant you preferential treatment in trade.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] has been most pleased to notice the esteem [trade_competition_city_winner.GetName] commands among [trade_competition_city_winner.GetHerHis] peers. Your own lacking prestige, however, has not gone unnoticed either.

This character is well-versed in the Nigerian Way of the Eagle, focusing on perfecting their authority over the troops, as well as embodying the centralized, decisive command over a battlefield, unfettered by overbearing advisors or delegation of command to others.

This character is well-versed in the Nigerian Way of the Hyena, focusing on the training, supply, and management of forces made up of various types, and how to use them in a determined, concentrated attack when the enemy is weakest.

This character is well-versed in the Nigerian Way of the Lion, focusing on speed, maneuvrability, misdirection, and when and how best to commit troops of various types in a decisive engagement to defeat the enemy.
This character is well-versed in the Nigerian Way of the Rhyno, focusing on how best to use the terrain to one's advantage, and how to use novel siege weapons to defeat a fortified enemy.
By creating the Holy Order Followers of Arjuna, all [Root.Religion.GetName] rulers will be able to hire them and use them in the struggle against those religions that would do us harm.
The Holy Order §YFollowers of Arjuna§! is established.
By creating the Holy Order Chosen of Ashoka, all [Root.Religion.GetName] rulers will be able to hire them and use them in the struggle against those religions that would do us harm.
The Holy Order §YChosen of Ashoka§! is established.
By creating the Holy Order Bulls of Rishabha, all [Root.Religion.GetName] rulers will be able to hire them and use them in the struggle against those religions that would do us harm.
The Holy Order §YBulls of Rishabha§! is established.

The [leader_of_arjuna.Religion.GetName] faith is one of the oldest religions in the world, yet nothing will last forever unless it is defended. Therefore, a great effort has been made to establish a new holy order. They call themselves the [leader_of_arjuna.PrimaryTitle.GetName].\n\nLead by a fearless warrior named [leader_of_arjuna.GetFirstName], they swear to answer the call of all devoted followers of [leader_of_arjuna.Religion.GetHighGodName]. To help them in their wars against the infidels and prove themselves worthy of the name Arjuna.
Praise [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]! They shall lead us to victory!
They might be necessary if we are to defend our faith.
Ha! As if such rabble would save them!

To safeguard the teachings of Buddha, many have banded together to form a new holy order. They have named themselves the [leader_of_ashokas.PrimaryTitle.GetName], after the great emperor of the same name.\n\nGuided by the leadersip of a cunning warrior known as [leader_of_ashokas.GetFirstName], the order vow to be the sword of any [leader_of_ashokas.Religion.GetName] ruler struggling against foreign conquerors and turn the tide of battle.

Followers of the [leader_of_rishabha.Religion.GetName] faith have always followed the central tenet of showing respect to all living creatures and to refrain from violence. But even the most peaceful of men must occasionally go to war.\n\nAs such, a new order has been founded, named the [leader_of_rishabha.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. They swear loyalty to all [leader_of_rishabha.Religion.GetName] rulers against those who would do them harm. A most devout [leader_of_rishabha.GetManWoman], named [leader_of_rishabha.GetFirstName], has pledged [leader_of_rishabha.GetHerselfHimself] to undertake the leadership of the order to preserve their way of life.
